allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; $zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead\(''Geopolitical Insider Trading Detection System.docx''\); $entry = $zip.Entries | Where-Object { $_FullName -eq ''word/document.xml'' }; $stream = $entry.Open\(\); $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader\($stream\); $content = $reader.ReadToEnd\(\); $reader.Close\(\); $stream.Close\(\); $zip.Dispose\(\); [xml]$xml = $content; $xml.document.body.InnerText")

Bash(powershell -Command "$word = New-Object -ComObject Word.Application; $word.Visible = $false; $doc = $word.Documents.Open\(''C:\\Users\\Cursist\\InsiderTradingDetection\\Geopolitical Insider Trading Detection System.docx''\); $doc.Content.Text; $doc.Close\(\); $word.Quit\(\)")
Bash(powershell Expand-Archive -Path "Geopolitical Insider Trading Detection System.docx" -DestinationPath "temp_docx" -Force)
Bash(powershell Expand-Archive -Path "''Geopolitical Insider Trading Detection System.docx''" -DestinationPath "''temp_docx''" -Force)
Bash(copy "Geopolitical Insider Trading Detection System.docx" temp_doc.zip)
